name: ContentsOnly: lifehacker
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("www.lifehacker.jp") {

/* Non-display part */
#extra_content,
#description,
#ad_01,
#ad_02,
#ad_03,
#ad_04,
#ad_05,
#ad_06,
#ad_07,
#ad_08,
#ad_09,
#ads_01,
#ads_02,
#ads_03,
#ads_04,
#ads_05,
#ads_06,
#ads_07,
#ads_08,
#ads_09,
#headvisual,
#headline_new,
#menu,
#access_data,
.page_navi,
#apBreakEnd,
.autoPagerS,
#sub_contents,
#foot,
.cat,
.e_com_tra,
.widget,
.ads_entrymore,
.clfx,
.entrymore_float_ads,
#ad_text,
#post,
.right,
.recententries
{ display: none !important; }

/* Display part */
body,
#detail,
#container,
#wrap,
#head_main,
#main,
.entry,
.entry_body
{
    width: auto !important;
    background: #ffffff !important;
    border: none !important;
    overflow: visible !important;
    float: none !important;
    font-size: large !important;
}

#head_main
{
    height: 130px !important;
}

}
